description: Try our easy to follow Japanese Crackers With Edamame Dip recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Japanese Crackers With Edamame Dip Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 12 frozen spring roll pastry sheets, thawed
200g frozen shelled edamame, thawed (plus extra to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Line 2 large baking trays with baking paper.

Spray 3 pastry sheets with oil and layer on top of each other, smoothing to remove any air bubbles. Cut into 6 wedges and arrange on tray. Repeat with remaining sheets to make 24 pieces. Spray again with oil. Arrange on trays and bake for 5 minutes or until golden brown and crisp. Cool on trays.
To make the dip, scoop avocado flesh into a blender or food processor. Add edamame, mayonnaise, half the wasabi peas, zest and lime juice. Season and process until smooth.
Transfer dip to a serving bowl and top with seaweed snack. Serve with pastry crackers and extra edamame and remaining wasabi peas.
